data.name: Para Eyes
data.detailed_description: Para Eyes is a spot the difference horror game. Your responsible for monitoring live security cameras and reporting anomalies. Anomalies range from moving objects, objects disappearing, objects changing, and many more. Anomalies will happen at random while on your 8 hour work shift. While anomalies are active you lose sanity, losing all your sanity causes you to go insane and lose the game. Explore multiple maps and difficulties. Each difficulty changes the frequency of anomalies spawning and adds a new camera to monitor. At the end of each game  you are awarded rewards, used to research anomaly packs and more. Adding anomaly packs to your map will add those unique anomalies and increases the overall total anomaly possibilities.
data.about_the_game: Para Eyes is a spot the difference horror game. Your responsible for monitoring live security cameras and reporting anomalies. Anomalies range from moving objects, objects disappearing, objects changing, and many more. Anomalies will happen at random while on your 8 hour work shift. While anomalies are active you lose sanity, losing all your sanity causes you to go insane and lose the game. Explore multiple maps and difficulties. Each difficulty changes the frequency of anomalies spawning and adds a new camera to monitor. At the end of each game  you are awarded rewards, used to research anomaly packs and more. Adding anomaly packs to your map will add those unique anomalies and increases the overall total anomaly possibilities.
data.short_description: Para Eyes is a spot the difference horror game. Flip threw security cameras and find anomalies. But be careful not to go insane.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Duel Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD RX590

content_descriptors.notes: This is a horror game that contains blood, violence, and other horror related content.
